name: Harvest Ninja
description:
The future is harsh - even to those reared in the ancient arts of stealth and fruit pilfering.

A lone ninja wanders upon a desolate farmland, its few patches of soil under heavy robotic guard. Using the nearby seeds and water, they set out to gather produce for the sake of their poor village.

The fruity thief steels their heart. Robot sentries do not need to eat.  They shall not miss a few melons.

Instructions
  • Grab a bag of seeds to seed farmable land
  • Grab a bucket to water the fields
  • Pick up the fruit when it's ripe
  • Bring it to your truck
  • Watch out for robot sentries!
  • When you have the requisite number of fruit, leave with your truck!
Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • SPACE to interact with your environment

This game was made for Ludum Dare 41 by frogcheese and gamesient. The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres." The game was made during the 72 hour jam.

Theme

Combine 2 Incompatible Genres: the idea was to take a farming simulator à la Harvest Moon and add stealth mechanics. A farming simulator where you farm somebody else's land and need to stay out of sight.
